item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea to re-sign Thiago Silva before World Cup?
item.description: Chelsea could be about to re-sign 41-year-old defender Thiago Silva before the World Cup. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

item.title: Even in retirement, Nick Saban's fingerprints are all over the CFP
item.description: Five of the head coaches in the playoff worked under and learned from Alabama's legendary leader.

item.title: Passan's hot stove temperature check: What's next in MLB free agency and on the trade market
item.description: While we wait for the next big moves, here's which offseason areas are red-hot -- and which are ice-cold.

item.title: Free agency reset: Predictions for the remaining top 10
item.description: A number of impact players are off the market, but there are still big names to be signed. Where do they fit best?

item.title: Rematches, underdogs and chaotic teams -- We've got it all in this CFP first round
item.description: Can this year's CFP match 2024's first round? It certainly won't lack for storylines.
